trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) supports several of the most widely used authentication and authorization protocols.
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) supports several of the most widely used authentication and authorization protocols.

trans-unit.source: The topics in this section describe the supported protocols and their implementation in Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: The topics in this section describe the supported protocols and their implementation in Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: The topics included a review of supported claim types, an introduction to the use of federation metadata, detailed OAuth 2.0.
trans-unit.target: The topics included a review of supported claim types, an introduction to the use of federation metadata, detailed OAuth 2.0.

trans-unit.source: and SAML 2.0 protocol reference documentation, and a troubleshooting section.
trans-unit.target: and SAML 2.0 protocol reference documentation, and a troubleshooting section.

trans-unit.source: This section includes the following topics.
trans-unit.target: This section includes the following topics.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="47a66b4d-540e-44fe-ae8c-cd92a160b32c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Important Information About Signing Key Rollover in Azure AD</link> – Learn about Azure AD’s signing key rollover cadence, changes you can make to update the key automatically, and discussion for how to update the most common application scenarios.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="47a66b4d-540e-44fe-ae8c-cd92a160b32c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Important Information About Signing Key Rollover in Azure AD</link> – Learn about Azure AD’s signing key rollover cadence, changes you can make to update the key automatically, and discussion for how to update the most common application scenarios.

trans-unit.source: <legacyLink xlink:href="9d35e4bc-7b72-49d1-b723-5464eee6be2c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Supported Token and Claim Types</legacyLink> - Learn about the claims in the tokens that Azure AD issue.
trans-unit.target: <legacyLink xlink:href="9d35e4bc-7b72-49d1-b723-5464eee6be2c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Supported Token and Claim Types</legacyLink> - Learn about the claims in the tokens that Azure AD issue.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="ee6193d7-1194-482a-a97c-51df5e31f458" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Federation Metadata</link> - Learn how to find and interpret the metadata documents that Azure AD generates.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="ee6193d7-1194-482a-a97c-51df5e31f458" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Federation Metadata</link> - Learn how to find and interpret the metadata documents that Azure AD generates.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="aeab0a46-4da1-4300-be9c-3be418f07a5b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">OAuth 2.0 in Azure AD</link> - Learn about the implementation of OAuth 2.0 in Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="aeab0a46-4da1-4300-be9c-3be418f07a5b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">OAuth 2.0 in Azure AD</link> - Learn about the implementation of OAuth 2.0 in Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="5a93bd22-64ac-4818-9b3a-dccdad8a93a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">OpenID Connect 1.0</link> - Learn how to use OAuth 2.0, an authorization protocol, for authentication.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="5a93bd22-64ac-4818-9b3a-dccdad8a93a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">OpenID Connect 1.0</link> - Learn how to use OAuth 2.0, an authorization protocol, for authentication.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="b079371b-0f80-4803-8b94-ddb0c54334fd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">SAML Protocol Reference</link> - Learn about the Single Sign-On and Single Sign-out SAML profiles of Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="b079371b-0f80-4803-8b94-ddb0c54334fd" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">SAML Protocol Reference</link> - Learn about the Single Sign-On and Single Sign-out SAML profiles of Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="a98d0258-d7d0-4179-b6b1-654fd28c7a11" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">WS-Federation 1.2</link> - Learn about WS-Federation 1.2 in Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="a98d0258-d7d0-4179-b6b1-654fd28c7a11" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">WS-Federation 1.2</link> - Learn about WS-Federation 1.2 in Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="70051d05-fbe5-4b1f-a03f-125482801b34" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Troubleshooting Authentication Protocols</link> - Learn how to prevent problems and interpret and resolve errors when using Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="70051d05-fbe5-4b1f-a03f-125482801b34" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Troubleshooting Authentication Protocols</link> - Learn how to prevent problems and interpret and resolve errors when using Azure AD.
